resources.string: Where you are searching from right now.
Error: Your location could not be determined.
Your location services are disabled; please re-enable them to use this feature.
There was a problem rendering the Maps view. Please ensure your phone has the latest version of Google Play Services.
If you don\'t want to register your device with Mobile Banking right now you can still use our mobile site.
Please enter the indicated characters from your security code
(The tag will appear in your history)
Please ensure you have given a rating or some feedback.
A network error when attempting to send the email occurred.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
You currently don\'t have any bank accounts.\n\nPlease visit your local Lloyds branch to set up a bank account.
There are currently no transactions to show.
There is no help menu available on this page!

Press Health Bar to check account health percentage

Press Account Dashboard to access account information.

Press Account Health to set goals.

Press Sign Into Google Play to enable scoreboard

Tap status/bio to edit your own story.
Select your account from the list below to access information related to your account.

Press Transactions to view transaction history

Press Make A Payment to pay bill

Press Transfer Funds to transfer between accounts

Press Account Health to set/view goals.

Press Year to view transactions in different years

Press Month to view transactions in particular month

Press Tags Analysis to view tags analysis.

Press Account to choose to pay from which account.

Press Continue to go confirm page.

Press Cancel to cancel payment.

Tap From/To to choose account

Tap Amount to enter amount

Tap Tag to choose tags

Tap Continue to go confirm page

Tap Cancel to go back.

Tap the stars to rate the app

Tap the grey area to write your comment

Tap Submit Feedback to submit your feedback anonymously.

Tap Find Branches to find nearby branches

Tap Find ATMs to find nearby ATMs

Tap and input postcode to find branches using postcode; hint: you may also type place names, i.e. York
Swipe left or right to discard notifications. You can disable notifications at any time via the Settings page.

Press Set For to set Month/Week

Press Set Goals to confirm settings

Press Reset to reset all inputs and set new goals for the next banking period.

Tap the Health Bar to view the Health percentage.

Tap Set Goals to set new goals.

 Tap Back To Profile to go back to your profile.
Tap Confirm to make the transfer.\n\nTap ancel to go back.
Your goals for this period have expired, you can now set new goals for the next period!
Your username cannot be empty. Please enter your username correctly.
Your password cannot be empty. Please enter your password correctly.
This field cannot be empty. Please enter your indicated character from your security phrase.
You were inactive for five minutes. For security reasons you were logged off automatically.
The account number must be 8 digits long.
The account number must only contain numerical digits.
The sort-code must be six digits long.
The sort-code must only contain numerical digits or dashes.
The payment must not be empty. Please enter an amount to pay.
The payment must be a GBP valid decimal amount. i.e. ## or ##.## are both permissible.
You must hold at least one other bank account with Lloyds in order to use the Transfer feature.
Congratulations, you have unlocked the first timer achievement - this is given to all those who log into the application for the first time.
Congratulations, you have logged in at least a 100 times - now that is dedication!
Congratulations, you have logged in at least 50 times - breathe banking!
Congratulations, you have logged in at least 25 times - banking is educational!
Congratulations, you have been using this application for a month, that\'s outstanding!
Congratulations, you\'ve visited a Lloyds branch!
Congratulations, you\'ve unlocked the magic number! How did you unlock it? It\'s a secret.
Congratulations, you have unlocked an achievement!
The spend amount must be a GBP valid decimal amount. i.e. ## or ##.## are both permissible.
The spend amount must be greater than £
The save amount must be a GBP valid decimal amount. i.e. ## or ##.## are both permissible.
The save amount must be greater than £
The overdraft amount must be a GBP valid decimal amount. i.e. ## or ##.## are both permissible.
The overdraft amount must be greater than £
You must select whether you wish to donate or not.
Un-check this value if you wish to not receive email notifications from the Lloyds Bank.
Un-check this value if you wish to not receive push notifications from the Lloyds Bank directly to your phone.
Un-check this value if you wish to not receive notifications to your wearable device from the Lloyds bank if you have one configured.

A network error occurred. Please check your device's Internet connectivity and try again.

Technical info:

A (de)serialisation error occurred. Please contact support.

Technical info:

Lloyds Bank is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again shortly. If the problem still occurs, please contact support.

Technical info:

An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support.

Technical info:
